channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Loading Page with Loading Screen
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Loading Page with Loading Screen

item.title: CVE-2022-2169|2024-08-03T00:32:08.553Z -- unknown -- loading%20page%20with%20loading%20screen
item.description: The Loading Page with Loading Screen WordPress plugin before 1.0.83 does not escape its settings, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
